column2: Did you or your partner* ever go/Have you or your partner* ever been to a doctor or other medical care provider to talk about ways to help you have a baby together?
Which of the services (did/have) you or your/partner*) (have/had) to help you have a baby together? ENTER all that apply:
When you and your partner* went for medical help to have a baby together, was your partner ever told that he had any of the following male infertility problems? ENTER all that apply:
column17: 1 = Low sperm count or no semen
column19: 3 = Genetic disorder that alters sperm production

column2: Has a doctor or other medical care provider ever told you that you had fibroid tumors or myomas in your uterus?
